title: a
text: remote devices are prevented from simultaneously establishing non-remote connections with the system and communicating via some other connection to resources in external networks (i.e., split tunneling)

title: a
text: cryptographic mechanisms intended to prevent unauthorized disclosure of CUI are identified

title: b
text: alternative physical safeguards intended to prevent unauthorized disclosure of CUI are identified

title: c
text: either cryptographic mechanisms or alternative physical safeguards are implemented to prevent unauthorized disclosure of CUI during transmission

title: a
text: a period of inactivity to terminate network connections associated with communications sessions is defined

title: b
text: network connections associated with communications sessions are terminated at the end of the sessions

title: c
text: network connections associated with communications sessions are terminated after the defined period of inactivity

title: a
text: cryptographic keys are established whenever cryptography is employed

title: b
text: cryptographic keys are managed whenever cryptography is employed

title: a
text: FIPS-validated cryptography is employed to protect the confidentiality of CUI

title: b
text: collaborative computing devices provide indication to users of devices in use

title: c
text: remote activation of collaborative computing devices is prohibited

title: a
text: use of mobile code is controlled

title: b
text: use of mobile code is monitored

title: a
text: use of Voice over Internet Protocol (VoIP) technologies is controlled

title: b
text: use of Voice over Internet Protocol (VoIP) technologies is monitored

title: a
text: the authenticity of communications sessions is protected

title: a
text: the confidentiality of CUI at rest is protected
